title: Humility Garden
description: Her destiny was among the gods. In the land of Salt, the gods have ruled among the humans for centuries. Now a new movement has taken grip, denying the gods are masters and thrusting the world into chaos.Young Humility Garden's only dream is to escape her squalid homeland. But the prophets envision a future that holds much more. She is about to embark on a journey that will teach her the secretive ways of the ghostiers, the language of the gods, and the power of eternal love. Amid countless enemies, in a wondrous realm of divine beauty and ruthless politics, Humility discovers that her fate and the fate of Salt are inextricably intertwined, and that together they may rise to new heights - or fall into the bitterest depths...
author: Felicity Savage
